channel.title: Project Unforgiven 1.2
channel.description:
[center][u][i]Project Unforgiven[/i][/u][/center]
Sadfully I think Project Unforgiven 1.2 will be my last Release, Of the Project Unforgiven Series. I'm just fed up with the SilabGarza base. My work on 1.2 should have really been 1.3 but There was a few thing's I didn't finish. I'm sorry to the people who used 1.0 as a base, and wanted a 2.0 I've just quit with this project. I may pick It up again one day.. but Until then, I'm moving on.
Features:
100% combat 100% prayer 100% range/mage 100% skill capes 100% Specials
All 1.0 Item's/Npc's
Un-nulled Items.
Re-Done Shops.
2 new Custom Models.
PvP Area (NOT FINISHED)
Working Dark Bow
Dragon Vissage Drops
Full Bandos
Full Armadayl
[center]New Various Item's Shop[/center]
[IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo256/rofllewisrofl/Shops.png[/img]
[center]Perfect Bandos, Dfs, Netiziot, with Bonus's[/center]
[IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo256/rofllewisrofl/Neitiznot.png[/img]
[center]Perfect Armadayl with Bonus's[/center]
[IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo256/rofllewisrofl/armda.png[/img]
[center]Perfect Torso[/center]
[IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo256/rofllewisrofl/torso.png[/img]
[center]ENJOY :][/center]
[IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo256/rofllewisrofl/hot.png[/img]
Well, That's 1.2, I hope you all Enjoy It. P.S- The client, I use Is a friend's. Project Courage. You'll need that too see A lot of the custom Item's.
Good-Bye, Project Unforgiven. :p
Credits:
Sk1ttlezrule43v- 35% Setsuna- 5% Pl0x0rz- 5% Me- 55%
Server Download- http://www.mediafire.com/?z2eromjkyjl
Client Download- http://www.mediafire.com/?5zijwen5zew <--- That's project courage's client. You'll need It too see some of the custom Item's, and really experience Project Unforgiven 1.2 for what It is.
Enjoy Everyone.

item.title: Project Unforgiven 1.2
item.dc:creator: @rofllewisrofl rofllewisrofl
item.description:
@rofllewisrofl wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:9, topic:268096”][quote author=x power x link=topic=353867.msg2711452#msg2711452 date=1237329594]
Looks nice. Sorry, its leeched a bit, but nice what you did do.
[/quote]
This is not leeched. Although his 1.0 and 1.2 are not very different, I can see he put a bit of work into this.[/quote]

Thanks for realizing this. 1.0 and 1.2 main difference’s are the new Item’s that The Client Allows. I also did a massive shop re-do, and some work to the PvP area.

Read full topic

[center]Project Unforgiven[/center]

Sadfully I think Project Unforgiven 1.2 will be my last Release, Of the Project Unforgiven Series. I’m just fed up with the SilabGarza base.
